2.0.name: wordpress/wordpress-weather-widget
2.0.description:
WordPress Weather Widget.This plugin will show current day and next 4 days weather forecast.For more information,check out our blog!

Features:

  • Easy to setup.You don’t need any kind of Programming.After activation,check the widget section and enter the name of the city.
  • Well documented source code,you can easily customize the code
  • Easy location input
  • 4 days weather Forecast.
  • Our plugin included with custom icon.You can easily change the icon my replacing default icons on image folder.
